entry.def: To remodel something such as a building or a room means to give it a different form or shape.

example.ex: Workmen were hired to remodel and enlarge the farm buildings...
example.tran: 雇用了工人来改造和扩建农场建筑。

example.ex: The house was remodelled by its present owner.
example.tran: 现在的房主改建了这座房子。

means.word_mean: 1. do over, as of (part of) a house;

stems_affixes.word_buile: mod量度,方式,模式,风度+ern..方向的→最近式样
mod量度,方式,模式,风度+est→做事有规矩→礼貌的

out出+mod量度,方式,模式,风度+ed……的→出了时髦[moded时髦的]→不时髦的
modest[adj.谦虚的,有节制的]+y状态→n.谦逊;端庄;羞怯

com共同+mod模式+ity表名词→有共同的模式物品→商品
mod量度,方式,模式,风度+ulate=ate表动词→对模式进行调整→调整
